participant_1.background:
I love watching Gila chase the sunbeams around my living room.
i am a writer.
my wife has terminal cancer.
My new love is the one who got me over my fear of left turns.
I like listening to folk metal and riding my boat.

participant_2.background:
I have to use social media for work, but it's not a big part of my life.
i am fairly conservative in politics.
I started a blog to share my love of romance novels with others.
i have never traveled out of the country.
My students are my favorite people because they make me laugh and smile every day.

content.text: What do you like to do in your free time?
I'm a teacher, so my free time is pretty limited. I like to read, go to the movies, and hang out with my friends.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I have a wife with terminal cancer, so I don't have much free time either. I like to write, ride my boat, and watch my dog chase the sunbeams around the living room.
I'm so sorry to hear about your wife. I hope she's doing well. I can't imagine how difficult that must be for you.
Thank you. She's doing as well as can be expected. It's been a long journey, but we're still here together.
That's great to hear. I'm glad you have each other.
Me too. What's your blog about?
It's about romance novels. I love to read them, and I wanted to share my love with others.
That sounds like a great idea. I've never read a romance novel before, but I might have to check out your blog.
I hope you do! I'm sure you'll find something you like.
Thanks! I'm sure I will.
So, what do you do for work?
I'm a writer. I write short stories and novels.
That sounds really interesting. What kind of stories do you write?
I write a lot of different kinds of stories, but I mostly write horror and suspense.
I love horror movies! I'm not sure if I'd be brave enough to read a horror story, though.
You should give it a try! I'm sure you'd like it.
Maybe I will. Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem. I'm always happy to talk about books.
Me too! I love books
